name: Twilight
description: BotForge's default theme, immerses users in a dark mode with enchanting shades of purple, evoking the remnants of ancient magic.

name: Dark
description: Reduce eye strain with our Dark theme's subdued colors.

name: Light
description: A clean, modern and definitely bright theme for people with optimal eye condition.

name: Amoled
description: Perfect for users with AMOLED screens or those who appreciate a sleek, stylish interface.

name: Amity
description: Amity brings a sense of harmony to your interface with its calming purple tones, perfect for creating a serene experience while coding.
